name: BuddyBunny
description: Buddy bunny is an interesting, exciting and kind game where you can experience a real feeling of love and show concern. The game will show you how much you are willing to account for the care of real pets. Improve your skills, and stay in tune with their needs. Like as any living creature, the pet needs food, rest and entertainment. Grow food, feed the bunny, put it to bed and read books to it, like a real friend. Immerse yourself in a cozy homely atmosphere with a likable musical accompaniment.
